text: The Rapid Intervention Force (FNSH) () is the reserve force of the Albanian State Police which is tasked to carry out special security operations and resolve situations that can not be overcome by other police services, the execution of which requires specially prepared and equipped personnel. FNSH offers assistance in cases of civil emergencies and accidents for the protection of life and property.Drejtoria FLO ==See also== *Albanian Police *RENEA ==References== Category:Law enforcement agencies of Albania Category:1992 establishments in Albania
title: Rapid Intervention Force (Albania)
